prompt.description: A description of the music, specifying style, mood, and scenario. Length: 10–300 characters.

lyrics.description:
Lyrics of the song. Use (
) to separate lines. You may add structure tags like [Intro], [Verse], [Chorus], [Bridge], [Outro] to enhance the arrangement. Length: 10–3000 characters.
lyrics.example:
[Verse]
Streetlights flicker, the night breeze sighs
Shadows stretch as I walk alone
An old coat wraps my silent sorrow
Wandering, longing, where should I go
[Chorus]
Pushing the wooden door, the aroma spreads
In a familiar corner, a stranger gazes

sample_rate.description: The sampling rate of the generated music.

bitrate.description: The bit rate of the generated music.

format.description: The format of the generated music.

id.description: The ID of the generated audio.

status.description: The current status of the generation task.

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

error.description: Description of the error, if any.

credits_used.description: The number of tokens consumed during generation.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -L \
  --request POST \
  --url 'https://api.aimlapi.com/v2/generate/audio' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
      "model": "minimax/music-1.5",
      "prompt": "Lo-fi pop hip-hop ambient music",
      "lyrics": "[Verse] Streetlights flicker, the night breeze sighs Shadows stretch as I walk alone An old coat wraps my silent sorrow Wandering, longing, where should I go [Chorus] Pushing the wooden door, the aroma spreads In a familiar corner, a stranger gazes."
    }'

POST /v2/generate/audio HTTP/1.1
Host: api.aimlapi.com
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: */*

{
  "model": "minimax/music-1.5",
  "prompt": "Lo-fi pop hip-hop ambient music",
  "lyrics": "[Verse] Streetlights flicker, the night breeze sighs Shadows stretch as I walk alone An old coat wraps my silent sorrow Wandering, longing, where should I go [Chorus] Pushing the wooden door, the aroma spreads In a familiar corner, a stranger gazes."
}
